alert.note: Alert for Colbert (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 1:06PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Colbert County through 145 PM CDT... At 106 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Iuka, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cherokee, Malone, Mynot, Mt Hester, Margerum and Allsboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
